Horace Leonard Gold bụ onye amuru n' ọnwa Epril na ụbọchị nke iri abụọ na isii , na afọ otu puku, narị itoolu na iri na anọ,, ya anwụọ na onwa Febrụwarị, n' ụbọchị iri abụọ na otu, na afọ otu puku, narị itoolu na iri itoolu na isii, bụ onye odee nke science fiction nke mba Amerịka ma bụrụ kwa ọka odee
Amuru ya na mba Kanada Gold gara mba nke United States mgbe ọgbara afọ abụọ
Amara ya nke ọma maka iwe bata iihe azụ chara nke  ọma ya na ụzọ ọhụrụ na science fiction
Mgbe ọ bụ onye ọ dee nke Galaxy Science Fiction, ma ọ dere nwa Mak DC Comics.

Gold bụ onye Juu, a na-ekwukwa na ọ ga-ede akwụkwọ na mbụ n'okpuru aha nzuzo n'ihi na ndị na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na-atụ egwu na ndị na'agụ akwụkwọ nwere ike imegide ndị Juu
E debara aha ya na ndị agha US n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ, na-eje ozi na Pacific theater of Operations
Alụmdi na nwunye ya na Evelyn Stein kwụsịrị na ịgba alụkwaghịm na 1957, alụmdi na nwunye nke abụọ ya bụ Muriel "Nicky" (Nicholson) Conley
Ọ nwụrụ na 1996.

Gold bụ onye na-ese ihe, onye edemede, onye na-eti egwu na otu n'ime ndị na-egwu egwuregwu n'ịntanetị.

Mgbe ọ ghọsịrị onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Galaxy Gold dere na dị ka "nwatakịrị nwoke mara mma" ọ "chọtara akụkọ sayensị na 1927, mgbe ọ dị afọ 13": 
 
During the 1930s, Gold unsuccessfully wrote stories for pulp magazines

The day he was fired from his regular job because his boss believed that a writer should not work as a busboy, Gold learned that he had made his first sale. Beginning with "Inflexure" (as Clyde Crane Campbell) in Astounding Science Fiction (October 1934), Gold later worked for Standard Magazines, Fawcett Comics and Timely Comics
He used the Campbell pen-name for his first half-dozen or so stories in 1934/35
When he resumed his writing career in 1938 he took the billing Horace L
Gold, but soon shortened it to the now more familiar H
L
Gold.
Akụkọ Gold kachasị ama na-elekwasị anya na nrọ efu, dị ka "Nsogbu na Mmiri" (1939)
N'afọ 1939-41 ọ bụ osote onye nchịkọta akụkọ na magazin atọ nke akụkọ sayensị - Captain Future, Thrilling Wonder Stories na Startling Stories
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke afọ 1939, None But Lucifer in Unknown (September 1939) bụ njikọ aka ya na L
Sprague de Camp.

N'oge mmalite afọ 1940, Gold sonyeere Kendell Foster Crossen na edemede akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị, na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya na DC Comics na-ede maka Batman, Superman, Superboy, Boy Commandos na Wonder Woman site na "ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ njedebe nke 1942" ruo mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ kwụsịrị ọrụ ya
E debara aha ya na 1944, ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ onye Canada, ụkwụ dị larịị, oke afọ ma nwee nwa a mụrụ ọhụrụ
Ọ laghachiri na ezumike ọmịiko (ma eleghị anya na Mee 1946) ka ọ nọrọ n'akụkụ àkwà nna ya Henry na Fall River, Massachusetts. E nyere ya onye nduzi nke Armed Forces Radio mgbe agha gasịrị, nke ọ jụrụ
Mgbe o jere ozi, ọ laghachiri New York City, ebe o dere maka akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị na mmemme redio

Akụkọ Gold "The Old Die Rich" (Galaxy Science Fiction, March 1953), nke e dere n'otu oge ahụ dị ka Marcia Davenport's My Brother's Keeper, nwere ike ịbụ na akụkọ New York Times banyere ụmụnne Collyer dị ka akwụkwọ akụkọ Davenport
Gold na-ahụkarị echiche akụkọ na mpempe akwụkwọ akụkọ.

Gold bụ ma eleghị anya onye a maara nke ọma dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ magazin na-eduga n'oge akụkọ sayensị sayensị nke America mgbe Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ gasịrị
N'afọ 1949, ọ malitere n'ụzọ ahụ, wee malite Galaxy Science Fiction n'afọ 1950, nke n'oge na-adịghị anya, magazin fantasy ibe ya, Beyond Fantasy Fiction (1953-155) sochiri.
Gold's Galaxy "mere mmetụta dị egwu n'ụwa nke akụkọ sayensị", onye nọchiri Frederik Pohl kwuru na 1965, na "amamihe na mkpa"; "Ọ na-esiri ike ikwubiga okwu ókè na mmetụta ahụ"
Ụfọdụ ndị edemede hụrụ Gold dị ka "ụdị onye na-edu ohu" mana, Pohl kwuru, "dị ka otu n'ime ndị ohu a na-eti ihe ugboro ugboro
nsonaazụ ya bara uru"
Site na Galaxy Gold mepụtara ụdị akụkọ sayensị dị iche iche site n'ilekwasị anya na teknụzụ, ngwaike na njem pulp
Kama nke ahụ, o webatara isiokwu ndị na-adabere na sociology, psychology na satire
Ọ kwụrụ ụgwọ karịa ka ọ na-adịkarị n'oge ahụ ma nwee uru na ọtụtụ ndị edemede nwere nkà ahapụla John W
Campbell n'ihi ịnụ ọkụ n'obi ya maka Dianetics.
Gold dezigharịrị ọtụtụ anthologies (1952 Xi62) metụtara magazin ahụ
Ọ tara ahụhụ site na mmụba agoraphobia (nke sitere na nsogbu agha), wee laa ezumike nká na Galaxy na 1961 n'ihi nsogbu ahụike ya
Gold biri ndụ ya fọdụrụ na nzuzo, ọ bụ ezie na o bipụtara akụkọ mkpirikpi na nchịkọta akụkọ ndị ọbịa site na mmalite afọ 1980.

Nchịkọta ya The Old Die Rich (Crown, 1955) gụnyere "And Three to Get Ready", "At the Post", "The Biography Project" (dị ka Dudley Dell), "Don't Take It to Heart", "Hero", "Love in the Dark" (nke a makwaara dị ka "Love Ethereal"), "Man of Parts", "The Man with English", "No Charge for Alterations", "The Old Die Rich", "Problem in Murder" na "Trouble with Water"
Ọ bụ ezie na Anthony Boucher toro Gold dị ka "ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ naanị onye edemede s.f
nwere ike ịmepụta ihe ndabere dị ala na nke dị ala," ọ chọpụtara na akụkọ ndị ahụ "erughị ụkpụrụ nke nka" nke Gold setịpụrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ.
